About Us
Myerlee Golf & Country Club is a semi- private / public golf course open to the public, located in a convenient spot in southwest Florida, right off Winkler Rd, between Gladiolus Dr. and Cypress Lake Dr.  Our golf course has many attractions, such as a tiki bar, a putting area, a chipping practice area, and 18 holes of par 60 golf. We encourage vacationers and locals alike to come to Myerlee Country Club for a fun day of golf!
Tee times can be booked up to 7 days in advance, 24 hours a day
Juniors (16 and under) play for free
Cart is included with fee
Memberships are available
